name: Compliment
0:
”Alexa, Open Sugar Candy”
”Alexa, say something nice from Sugar Candy”
”Alexa, tell Sugar Candy to say something nice to Harry”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sugar candy
des: Compliment delivers a random, meaningful compliment. You can ask Compliment to compliment yourself or someone else by saying his/her name. Depending on the name provided, it gives compliments particularly for men or women. Try it out, a good compliment can spark your day!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
